        <description>This script include contains visibility logic of the Notify call tab on SOW for the Incident and Incident task tables </description>
        <name>SOWNotifyIncidentVisibilitySNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SOWNotifyIncidentVisibilitySNC = Class.create();
SOWNotifyIncidentVisibilitySNC.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    INCIDENT_TABLE: "incident",
    INCIDENT_TASK_TABLE: "incident_task",

    canShowCallsTab: function(recordSysId, table) {
        if (table === this.INCIDENT_TABLE || table === this.INCIDENT_TASK_TABLE) {
            var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
            if (gr.get(recordSysId) && gr.canWrite())
                return true;
        }
        return false;
    },

    canShowSendSMS: function(recordSysId, table) {
        if (table === this.INCIDENT_TABLE || table === this.INCIDENT_TASK_TABLE) {
            var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
            if (gr.get(recordSysId) && gr.canWrite())
                return true;
        }
        return false;
    },

    type: 'SOWNotifyIncidentVisibilitySNC'
};]]></script>
